biography: Lyudmila Vasilyevna Zajtseva (Russian: Людмила Васильевна Зайцева; born 21 July 1946) is a Soviet and Russian film actress, People's Artist of the RSFSR (1989) and laureate of the State Prize of the USSR (1983). Her movie career began in 1967.
name: Lyudmila Zaytseva
place_of_birth: Vostochny, Krasnodar Krai, RSFSR, USSR [now Russia]
